name: Deep Devourer's Domain
description:
Cards you have Discarded or used for Tune will be consumed.
For every 3 cards consumed, the All-Devouring Narwhal gains 1 extra Max HP when the Round ends. If there are at least 2 Cards amongst these that have the same original Elemental Dice Cost, gain another 1 extra Max HP. If all 3 Cards have the same original Elemental Dice Cost, gain yet another 1 extra Max HP.
